---
title: "validationConfig_NGFS_MESSAGE"
output: html_document
---

Configuration file for NGFS validation with model-native regions.

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(readr)
library(DT)

# Load the CSV from inst/config
df <- piamValidation::getConfig("NGFS_MESSAGEix-GLOBIOM-GAINS21-R12_2025-10-14")

font.size <- "9pt"

df %>%
   DT::datatable(
     options = list(
       pageLength = 100,
       initComplete = htmlwidgets::JS(
          "function(settings, json) {",
          paste0("$(this.api().table().container()).css({'font-size': '", font.size, "'});"),
          "}"),
      filter = 'top'  # This enables the column filters
      )
    )

```
